item.title: Simon Wilson: The harsh reality of Auckland Council's new budget
item.description:
COMMENT:
Auckland Council expects to lose half a billion dollars in revenue this year and has proposed a new emergency budget to cope. It's not pretty. They'll sell $200 million worth of property and ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202023/A_270520NZHABZOO21_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=People at the elephant enclosure on a wet weather day at Auckland Zoo. The zoo has not brought in revenue for the council during much of the Covid-19 lockdown. Photo / Alex Burton

item.description:
